item.title: Sandra add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "Introverts, in contrast, may have strong social skills and enjoy parties and business meetings, but after a while wish they were home in their pajamas. They prefer to devote their social energies to close friends, colleagues, and family. They listen more than they talk, think before they speak, and often feel as if they express themselves better in writing than in conversation. They tend to dislike conflict. Many have a horror of small talk, but enjoy deep discussions." -- Susan Cain

item.title: Sandra add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "There's zero correlation between being the best talker and having the best ideas." -- Susan Cain

item.title: Sandra add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "...I also believe that introversion is my greatest strength. I have such a strong inner life that Iâ€™m never bored and only occasionally lonely. No matter what mayhem is happening around me, I know I can always turn inward." -- Susan Cain
